dc_title_s: Map to illustrate the offensive of the St. Mihiel salient
dc_description_s: Shows region between St. Mihiel and Metz.; Base map: St. Mihiel salient.; "To accompany report of the Commander in Chief, November 20, 1918."; Accompanied by mimeographed index: History of the St. Mihiel Salient : index. 6 leaves ; 31 cm.; Stamped on: Summerall papers.|42 x 54 centimeters|Scale 1:100,000|City Maps
